Articles.Content:
Hello all,

My name is RexProcer. I've been playing Kerbal since the early days on and off. I am an IRL science geek with a love of space, which is why I got into this game in the first place. It's fascinating to learn some stuff about orbital mechanics and how things really work. Look forward to meeting/playing with some of you. By the way, is there a teamspeak or something of the sort where people will gather and talk while playing?

Edited May 3, 2015 by RexProcer

Welcome to the forums!

I don't know of a teamspeak, unfortunately.

It's a singleplayer game, so I don't think so.

But you can use the forums!

BTW: Welcome!
